events.name: Get comprehesive App Performance and User insights - #DynatraceTestDrive­
events.description: Dynatrace is offering a new personal license that will give you the opportunity to debug your application locally. This is an excellent news for developers trying to troubleshoot applications locally. Take the most trusted APM for a test drive. Only 3 steps (Install, Connect and Analyse) to start analysing the performance of your applications and get : - Transactions flow PurePath from device and database - Auto diagnostic dashboard that highlight where and why your application breaks - Visibility into your application performance issues as to whether it is code or deployment related - Ability to diagnose root causes down to the method level Please bring along a laptop with 8GB RAM and 20GB hard disk with window OS if you would like to follow through the the Test Drive with us. (Feel Free to join us even if you are not able to bring your laptop)
events.location: The Co 75 High Street Singapore 179435, 75 High Street Singapore 179435

events.name: Hackware v0.9
events.description: Hackware is a monthly meetup for hardware developers and enthusiasts to share hacks and developments in the hardware scene, promote hardware development and to build a community of hardware developers. Agenda & Talks for this meetup: 1. High Level Synthesis tools - Augustine Koh 2. FPGA 101 - Michał J. Gajda​ (Lightning) 3. ?? - Andreas Schlegel 4. Cupcade - Kenneth Yong (Lightning) Socialize and Network with other Hackware members. Talks : ~20mins. Lightning Talks : ~5mins.
events.location: iDA Labs @National Design Centre, 111 Middle Road, #03-04, Singapore 188969
